Colonial Assembly

Government officials in the colony of {1_City} have decided to form a Colonial Assembly with which to legislate their own laws and budgets. They have assured us that this is in the interests of the empire, however, and not a step toward independence.
Hm, suspicious. Best we shut this down.
That sounds reasonable.

Colonial Migration
A wave of immigrants have flocked to the colony of {1_City}, in search of opportunity and wealth. They will, of course, find only hardship and want, but who are we to deny them?
Offer passage to the Capital. The colony cannot support any more bodies.
Excellent. They can get right to work.
